synopsis:
"I Accidentally Woke Up!"- Mizuki Hijiri is a high school girl who transferred in the middle of the school year for some reason. There are four boys who she met are with Juunibyou?? Noda who admires main character, Takashima is an ikemen, but is sad because of otaku, Nakamura is a reincarnation of either angel or devil (?), Tsukumo who acts like he works for the bad guy. They are also singers who are narcissists and very heavy in taste. She cannot catch up with the tsukkomi to their imaginations and berserk!

(Source: MAL News)
